name: Yet-another-new-tab-page
tagline: One of the most customisable, productive and eye-pleasing new tab page ever
body:
# Yet-another-new-tab-page
Yet another new tab page which increases your productivity, customises the browser to your tastes and does not have any redundant stuff.

Customise the add-on to your taste by clicking the wrench icon in the bottom right corner.

* Customise your name displayed on the page
* Change your background by entering the url to the image
* Customise your layout
* Add or delete tiles
* Have a different icon for every tile
* Carry your data. Export and Import for any web browser on any platform with a click of a button


###Installation and Usage

#####Chrome
Download it from the [web store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/yet-another-new-tab-page/dbnbjnjckidjkjdocfflalcgmlhkcfee)

#####Firefox
Download it from the [add-on store](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/yet-another-new-tab-page/)

#####Web app
Set the following URL as your default new tab page - [https://yet-another-new-tab-page.appspot.com](https://yet-another-new-tab-page.appspot.com)

###Pull requests and comments welcome


###Future Plans
* Have a more streamlined options page
* Get rid of icons from the repository and allow the user to give his/her own icon
* Allow customising header and footer

#####Notes
* Using a very high resolution image as a background can slow down the loading of the page ( especially when you have a poor internet connection).
* All the logos are trademarks/copyrights of their respective companies. I do not endorse or promote them in any way.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
